<S%H518>"If<s%> He <S%H2498>passes<s%> by or <S%H5462>shuts<s%> up, Or <S%H6950>calls<s%> an <S%H6950>assembly,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H7725>restrain<s%> Him?

<S%H518>"If<s%> you would <S%H3559>direct<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3559>right,<s%> And <S%H6566>spread<s%> out your <S%H3709>hand<s%> to Him;

<S%H227>"Then,<s%> <S%H3588>indeed,<s%> you could <S%H5375>lift<s%> up your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> [moral] <S%H9249>defect,<s%> And you would be <S%H3332>steadfast<s%> and not <S%H3372>fear.<s%>
